translate.english: fall in love at first sight

examples.example: 我对那座美丽的城市一见钟情，从此便深深爱上了它。

translate.english: I fell in love with that beautiful city at first sight and have deeply loved it ever since.

examples.example: 他对她可谓一见钟情，目光交汇的瞬间就认定了彼此。

translate.english: He can be said to fall in love with her at first sight, and at the moment of eye contact, they have determined each other.

examples.example: 我和他在初次见面时便一见钟情，开启了一段美好的爱情之旅。

translate.english: I fell in love with him at first sight when we first met and started a wonderful journey of love.
